system.description:
Time: 15-RSI seconds+Ritual: Chant
Range: RSI miles+Duration: 1 (MS); 3 (CS) hours

Calls an friendly animal within Range. The animal may resist with a WIL Ã—3 check, unless its True Name is used in the invocation. The animal might not (GM Discretion) approach a cleric in a group. If not threatened, the animal will come close enough to touch.
